body_content.explanation: an important official in some Muslim countries in the past, especially one who advises and helps a powerful ruler:
examples: Shmu'el Hanagid was an 11th-century poet, general and vizier to the Muslim ruler of Granada.
Kemal served in the government of Ahmed Tevfik Pasha, Grand Vizier of the Ottoman Empire.

body_content.explanation: the most important adviser and helper of a powerful person:
examples: At that time Campbell was grand vizier to the Prime Minister.
